title: Ban appeal
body: My account name is grey fullebuster and i was banned a year ago for being toxic. I have spent hundreds of dollars on the game (not an excuse) and i was rightfully banned. It has been a year and i have rethought my life as a whole and become a better person from different experiences. If possible i would like for my account to be unbanned. I can understand if u do not unban me but i would like to just ask for this request anyway.

replies.body:
Riot don't  appeal perma bans , there was a guy that was bi-polar with medical evidence, had been put on medication and not been toxic since that even couldn't get his account appealed with proof.

Riot are trash.

its worth a shot

The best way to appeal a ban is through [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us), there's not much that can be done through the boards. That said, the chances of any appeal being successful against a rightful ban is practically non-existent.
